events.message: I would like to request a refund for the headphone set I purchased last week because they stopped working after only two days.
The case has been identified as a refund request related to product malfunction and customer dissatisfaction.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the request for the faulty headphones refund.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your headphones. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a description of the problem in more detail to process the refund quickly?
Order number is 12345678. The headphones do not power on anymore, and I have already tried charging them overnight.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid shipping label to return the faulty item.
Thanks for the prompt response and solution. I appreciate the quick handling of this issue.
We have processed your refund and emailed you the shipping label. Please send the headphones back at your convenience.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now as the refund was successfully processed and there have been no further issues reported.
